channel.title: Any landscape editor that can?
channel.description:
Is their any public landscape editor that allows you to copy a tile and then brush it anywhere else. I am using the RSC COMMUNITY LANDSCAPE editor and you can only copy and paste tiles one at a time so its very slow, anyone got anything better that they can share?
Thnx

item.title: Any landscape editor that can?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

xx c1ph3r xx:

If the source was ever released for community landscape editor by xEnt/Vrunk/Peter then you could probably code one in yourself with not too much difficulty.

Put it in your ass faggot

Read full topic

item.title: Any landscape editor that can?
item.dc:creator: @RussianDog RussianDog
item.description:
@RussianDog wrote:

xEnt:

yeah hes talking about copying all the tile properties onto others, no there is no bigger brush size in the public available ones.

Yeah, damn ty for letting me know

item.title: Any landscape editor that can?
item.dc:creator: @RussianDog RussianDog
item.description:
@RussianDog wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:2, topic:308583”]You can’t just copy and paste 1 time at a time.

How about adding grass/water for instance. You telling me that is just copy and paste 1 tile?[/quote]

Those are the brushes already available, I am talking about if i need to copy a tile from a certain location, you HAVE to keep pasting it as far as I know.

Read full topic
